kvhc.models

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • kvhc.models.Step
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Step
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A class representing a step (e.g. a single "beat" on a channel).
    Author:
    kvhc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Step() 
      Step(boolean setActive, Channel channel, int stepid)
      Constructor.
      Step(Channel channel, int stepid)
      Constructor, sets isActive to false by default.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Step clone()
      Clones a step.

      Gets the ID of the step (for uniqueness).
      int getStepNumber()
      Get the step number (for saving and loading).

      Return the velocity ("volume") of the step.
      boolean isActive()
      Tells whether or not the step is enabled (audible).

      Resets the step to default values (Velocity=70%, step inactive).

    • Method Detail

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Enables or disables the step.
        Parameters:
        Active - True to enable the step, false to disable

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Tells whether or not the step is enabled (audible).
        Returns:
        true if the step is enabled, false if disabled

      • setVelolcity

        public void setVelolcity(float velocity)
        Sets the velocity ("volume") of the step. 0.0 is inaudible, 1.0 is normal volume.
        Parameters:
        velocity - a float greater than or equal to 0.0.

      • getVelocity

        public float getVelocity()
        Return the velocity ("volume") of the step. 0.0 is inaudible, 1.0 is normal volume.
        Returns:
        the velocity of the step.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the step to default values (Velocity=70%, step inactive).

      • getStepNumber

        public int getStepNumber()
        Get the step number (for saving and loading).
        Returns:
        the number of the step in the song.

      • setStepNumber

        public void setStepNumber(int stepNumber)
        Set the step number (for saving and loading).
        Parameters:
        step - position number

      • clone
